name: Let's Keep A Little Optimism Here (V)
Lore: 'The heroes of the Rebellion know that where there is life, there is hope.',
Text: 'Plays on table. Ounee Ta is canceled. At opponent''s Ralltiir and Renegade Planet sites, your Rebels are deploy -2 and your Force drains may not be modified or canceled by opponent. Your game text at opponent''s <>Swamp and <>Jungle is canceled. Your characters present at opponent''s <>Forest are immune to attrition.',
